summary: This is a declaration of authenticity from AT&T Legal Compliance Analyst Brian Faulkner, stating that after a thorough search, no responsive information was found in AT&T records for a request related to a Palm Beach County case (GLDC File Number: 3257380.001). The document is certified under penalty of perjury.

persons.name: Brian Faulkner
persons.context: He is the AT&T employee who attests under penalty of perjury that a search of AT&T records found no information responsive to a request related to a Palm Beach County case.

events.title: AT&T Declaration of Authenticity Filed
events.description: Brian Faulkner, an AT&T Legal Compliance Analyst, signs a declaration under penalty of perjury stating that AT&T records contain no information responsive to a request related to a Palm Beach County case.

keyFacts: AT&T conducted a search of its records in response to a request related to a Palm Beach County case (GLDC File Number: 3257380.001).
AT&T found no responsive information in its records.
The declaration was made under penalty of perjury by AT&T Legal Compliance Analyst Brian Faulkner on July 19, 2021.
